title: looking for someone to help me with my provisionals ive just turned level 30 ( support main)

replies.body: if you're new to the game and just hit lvl 30, don't go into ranked. you're just going to be put into bronze 4/5, wait a season or so, get 500+ games won in normals and then go for ranked.

I agree with this.

I did the same, i went too early into ranked and its been a nightmare to get out of bronze ever since.
i did it aswell back in s3, when i thought i was good, turns out i got into b3 - s4 b4, s5 - b5 and then i just got out of bronze 5 this season, made it to gold 5.
Congrats on getting gold 5! thats the dream for me, i got into silver last season and am trying to get back there (and hopefully beyond)

it's not what it turns out to be, gold 5 is pretty hard to climb out of.. some of the people i play with legit feels like they got boosted from bronze or didn't learn anything from climbing out of silver/bronze in the first place.. but, all i can do is try my best and climb.
Yo, add me GORDONNODROG Im S5 atm, Top and Jungle main. Looking to climb as well. :)
I'd focus on getting a full tier 3 runepage or 3=) and find those few champs in your main roles that click with you, spam em in normals and get awesome at them. then get into ranked=)
